alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Columbia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 3:02PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Columbia, northeastern Hamilton, eastern Echols, central Ware, Clinch and northwestern Charlton Counties through 330 PM EST... At 302 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Homerville to 9 miles north of Needmore to near Suwannee Springs. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waycross, Jasper, Homerville, Fargo, Argyle, Boggy Bay, Needmore, Manor, Belmont and Needham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
